SELECT t1.id, t1.app_id, t1.service_id, t1.api_state, t1.type, t2.api_code, t2.api_name as ServiceName, t2.api_desc as ServiceDesc, 1 as displayName, t1.create_time AS create_time, t2.create_time AS t2create_time, t3.create_time AS t3create_time FROM tb_app_service_config t1 LEFT JOIN tb_api_config t2 ON t1.service_id=t2.id LEFT JOIN tb_app_config t3 ON t1.app_id=t3.id WHERE t1.del_flag=1 AND t2.del_flag=1 AND t3.del_flag=1 AND t1.type=1 AND t3.id= #{query.appId}
AND (t2.api_name LIKE concat('%', #{query.keyword}, '%') OR t2.api_desc LIKE concat('%', #{query.keyword}, '%') )

SELECT t1.id, t1.app_id, t1.service_id, t1.api_state, t1.type, t2.sql_script as api_code, t2.table_name as ServiceName, t2.table_des as ServiceDesc, t2.display_name as displayName, t1.create_time AS create_time, t2.create_time AS t2create_time, t3.create_time AS t3create_time FROM tb_app_service_config t1 LEFT JOIN tb_table_service t2 ON t1.service_id=t2.id LEFT JOIN tb_app_config t3 ON t1.app_id=t3.id WHERE t1.del_flag=1 AND t2.del_flag=1 AND t3.del_flag=1 AND t1.type=2 AND t3.id= #{query.appId}
AND (t2.api_name LIKE concat('%', #{query.keyword}, '%') OR t2.api_desc LIKE concat('%', #{query.keyword}, '%') )

SELECT t1.id, t1.app_id, t1.service_id, t1.api_state, t1.type, t2.sql_script as api_code, t2.name as ServiceName, t2.describe as ServiceDesc, t2.display_name as displayName, t1.create_time AS create_time, t2.create_time AS t2create_time, t3.create_time AS t3create_time FROM tb_app_service_config t1 LEFT JOIN tb_file_service t2 ON t1.service_id=t2.id LEFT JOIN tb_app_config t3 ON t1.app_id=t3.id WHERE t1.del_flag=1 AND t2.del_flag=1 AND t3.del_flag=1 AND t1.type=3 AND t3.id= #{query.appId}
AND (t2.api_name LIKE concat('%', #{query.keyword}, '%') OR t2.api_desc LIKE concat('%', #{query.keyword}, '%') )
